channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic sign not visible, 9th August
item.description:
When the illuminated bollard on the traffic island outside Sainsbury's Local on Beckenham Road was replaced recently it was put back the wrong way round. This means that oncoming traffic from the direction of Beckenham can't see the "keep left" blue arrow warning it to avoid the island.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidney Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van hasn't moved for 5 days and night with multiple long ladders with overhangs. Accident waiting to happen, 9th August
item.description:
Many ladders on top this van not very secure ,it's dangerous. could be fatal as many deliveries on motor bikes come here as there is overhang of the ladders plus the ladders could be used to get in to the 1st floor apartments of the building. It's summer we sleep with our windows slightly open. Please get it removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, 33A, Southwick Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: PK59 XAS - Vehicle Parked with Ladder, 9th August
item.description:
Registration number PK59 XAS parked outside 29/31 Southwick Street London W2 1JQ since 5th August. The ladder is a cause of concern to residents as this will encourage opportunists to use the ladder to break in to properties.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, 33A, Southwick Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad smell, 9th August
item.description:
There is a bad smell coming from 37 Spenser Grove. It smells like something is rotting in there. Rubbish or a body or sewage. Tenant not seen for months. The smell has been around for about 10 days now.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Spenser Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ivy and trees, 8th August
item.description:
Hello, I was walking between the 2 schools earlier and found that many trees are overgrown and encroach on the designated path. I found myself in a position where I had to wait to let someone past because it was so overgrown, there is not enough space for 2 groups to pass by. There are a lot of weeds and Ivy as well. I grew up around this area and it has never been so overgrown. I feel it all needs to be cut back and the weeds dealt with. Kind regards, Jack
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Towncourt Lane, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Across the street from the bus stop but a little bit south, 8th August
item.description:
The street light isn't working and it remains dark, it's been like this for at least a week, maybe longer. It near the scaffolding that is currently up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Royal College Street, Saint Pancras, London
